title: LoadSpring Solutions, Inc.™ and Chiyoda System Technologies Corporation Announce Partnership.
text:
LoadSpring Solutions, Inc. 
WILMINGTON, Mass. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- LoadSpring Solutions Inc., a Massachusetts Corporation and Chiyoda System Technologies Corporation (CST) with corporate offices in Yokohama, Japan have announced their partnership. This reseller partnership is a critical strategic advancement for both companies. CST will now leverage the SpringBoard™, LoadSpring’s market leading Project Management Cloud Portal which is named “CST PROJECT CLOUD” and will be bundled with CST’s academy course and local support, for its current and future customers. CST PROJECT CLOUD, powered by LoadSpring will be delivered from a Singapore data center in both English and Japanese, improving usability and performance for CST’s global customer base. 
Both companies are industry leaders in the field of Project Management solutions. CST has an integrated application set that offers Primavera P6 & Ares Prism, two of the leading Project Management applications, which will now be available through the SpringBoard. This partnership will also make available to CST customers over 200 additional Project Management applications enabling them to fulfill the diverse application needs of their customers, as well other advanced services such as identity management and the integration of Project Management solutions to ERP systems. 
“We are very excited by our partnership with LoadSpring. “CST PROJECT CLOUD” is based on the strong and proven cloud platform “SpringBoard”. This offering will be a powerful solution providing our clients cloud services to manage their Enterprise Project Portfolio with improved efficiency.” Hiroyuki Nakasone, President & CEO, Chiyoda System Technologies Corporation. 
“We are excited to announce this partnership as it expands LoadSpring’s reach into the APAC region and with CST’s localized and experienced team it provides a complete Cloud Project Management solution for our joint existing and new customers.” Eric Leighton, CEO and President, LoadSpring Solutions. 
About LoadSpring 
Founded in 1999, LoadSpring Solutions is the market leader in Cloud Project Management solutions that are fast and easy to execute through their patented SpringBoard cloud portal. With four Class A data centers, LoadSpring currently services over 3,000 companies with 75,000 users worldwide. Their SSAE 16 SOC 2 security certification provides a highly secure infrastructure and cloud environment hosting over 200 Project Management related applications. LoadSpring’s around-the-clock dedicated customer support has led to a 90% rate of repeat customers in all industries, specializing in AEC (Architecture, Engineering, and Construction). 
For more information, contact Stacey Witt at switt@loadspring.com or visit www.loadspring.com . 
About CST 
CST (Chiyoda System Technologies Corporation)Established in 1956 as a subsidiary of Chiyoda Corporation, a leading global Engineering & Construction company in Japan. CST established a firm position in project portfolio management solution provider in Japan with global project management expertise, and has over 100 customers in each industry, such as Engineering and Construction, Oil and Gas, Utility, Government, Aerospace & Defense, Manufacturing, Financial, IT, etc.The company offers a range of complete software implementation services for Oracle PRIMAVERA, ARES PRISM, Deltek Acumen and Aconex project management software product line, from assessment, design, prototype, rollout, and support, to software installation services, training, and product& process consulting services.
